text: A solar flare created a geomagnetic storm that caused three hard drives to fail in an otherwise fault-tolerant system at the Toronto Stock Exchange to fail. This prevented access to critical market data leading the exchange to be shut down for three hours.
Ian Murdock announced the Debian Linux distribution system. The name combined his then girlfriend Debra's name with his own, Deb-Ian. And now you know how to properly pronounce it.
The first version Microsoft's Web browser, Internet Explorer 1, debuted. It was based on Mosaic, which Microsoft had licensed from Spyglass Inc.
